messages.message:
Developer opportunity for an amazing private company....

Hi Brian, 

I came across your profile and wanted to reach out to you. A very good friend of mine who is the VP/CIO of one of the fastest growing wellness products company in America is looking to add talent to the IT team. He has asked me to set out for a search for the TOP IT talent to add to their team. I am searching for amazing web, JavaScript and SQL developers to join the team! 

I would love the opportunity to connect with you should you be interested in a new and exciting opportunity in Scottsdale Az. I have attached the job descriptions for your review. If you are not currently looking please feel free to share my contact information with anyone you know that may be interested in this exciting opportunity! 

Here is just a little snap-shot of the company and growth. I look forward to the possible conversation!

Warmly,
Pamela


Plexus Worldwide
2014 & 2015 INC. 5000 RANK
3-Year Growth 2,833%
2014 Revenue $310.4 M
Location Scottsdale, AZ
Industry Health Products
Launched 2006

Pamela Fleming
pam@ondemadtm.com
